title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar. Build 200201151. When searching for references to this field, the search results are not selected.
OB: When double-clicking on the search result, the first match is not selected.
EB: When double-clicking on the search result, you should get 3 matches in method getTempDir().
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the project with the external jar. 
2. Perform a search for references to the specified field. 
3. Double-click on the first search result. 
4. Observe that the first match is not selected.
